title: Saskatchewan Ending PCR Testing For Public, Daily Reporting
description:
Despite rising, all-time high COVID-19 hospitalizations in the province, Saskatchewan is no longer providing daily updates starting Monday, February 7th. Beginning in April, the province will only provide data updates monthly.


COVID-19 PCR testing in Saskatchewan will no longer be available to the public starting Monday, February 7th. As a result, there will be significant impacts on reporting for Saskatchewan. More information on how this change will be managed will be provided as it becomes available.
